title: Senator Rand Paul (R-KY), "The Case Against Socialism"
description:
Senator Rand Paul (R-KY) talks about his book, The Case Against Socialism, in which he discusses the history of socialism and argues that there is a new threat of socialist ideology on the rise in the U.S.. He is interviewed by Representative Matt Gaetz (R-FL).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
